Package table

Class AppointmentsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • table.AppointmentsManager
  • public class AppointmentsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages application CRUD operations for the Appointments table in the database.

    See Also:
    Appointment

      • getAllAppointmentsForCustomer

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsForCustomer​(int customerId)
        Static method to get a ObservableList of all appointments for a given customer from the database.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        ObservableList of all appointments

      • filterAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> filterAppointments​(boolean monthly,
                                                                                javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointmentObservableList)
        Static method to convert an ObservableList of appointments into a new ObservableList filtered by month or by week.

        Parameters:
        monthly - boolean value to filter/not-filter by month
        appointmentObservableList - ObservableList of all appointments to filter
        Returns:
        ObservableList of appointments filtered by month or week

      • getAppointmentsWithinFifteenMinutes

        public static java.lang.String getAppointmentsWithinFifteenMinutes()
        Static method to check the database for any appointments that start within 15minutes of a user's local time.

        Returns:
        a string indicating if there are/not appointment(s) within 15min
